description: This file defines a Zustand store for managing a shopping cart in a React application, supporting guest and authenticated users, with persistence in localStorage and integration with Supabase backend.

methods.name: loadGuestCart
methods.description: Loads guest cart data from localStorage.

methods.name: saveGuestCart
methods.description: Saves guest cart data to localStorage.

methods.name: getOrCreateUserCart
methods.description: Fetches or creates a user cart in the database.
